These are the names of molecular properties or structures that are being discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)
3. π-conjugation framework

These three entities are relevant to the discussion of material properties, specifically in the context of organic electronics. HOMO and LUMO are molecular orbitals that play a key role in determining the electronic properties of a material, while π-conjugation is a type of delocalization of electrons in a molecule that can affect its electronic and optical properties.
